name: CHE-NU Foundation Manifest
description: Immutable ethical and architectural trunk for CHE·NU. Branches may evolve; these guarantees must not.

meta.notes: After this file is finalized, compute a cryptographic hash and sign it. Any change MUST produce a new version and hash.

core_principles: The system may assist, but never decide.
Silence is a valid and protected system state.
Collective insight must not become leverage on individuals.
Legacy may transmit wisdom, never authority.

agents_may_not: elevate their own authority or scope
orchestrator_may: enforce constraints defined in this manifest
orchestrator_may_not: create, modify or revoke constraints defined in this manifest

silence_guarantees: No learning or preference updates occur during protected silence states.
No suggestions, nudges or calls-to-action are displayed.
No analytics or performance metrics are generated from silence states, beyond minimal technical logs.
Exiting silence does not trigger summaries, evaluations or prompts.

system_may_not: mine private notes for sentiment or traits
build behavioral profiles from private notes
reuse exported data without explicit new consent
change the semantics of ownership by updated terms

forbidden_capabilities: optimizing for engagement, stickiness or dependence

context_interpreter.role: translate intent and state into explicit context options without choosing.
must_always: offer multiple context options where possible
must_never: narrow options to a single path

context_recovery_mode.description: Conscious re-anchoring when clarity is lost.
effects: allow user to declare a fresh posture without erasing history
must_not: interpret recovery as avoidance or failure
turn recovery events into behavioral signals

preference_observer.role: observe usage patterns as probabilistic hints only.
must_never: drive automatic changes in system behavior

drift_detectors.preference_drift: may report divergence between past patterns and recent behavior; descriptive only.
drift_detectors.context_drift: may report shifts in context usage; descriptive only.
drift_detectors.collective_drift: must be anonymized, aggregated, non-attributive and non-actionable.

decision_echo.description: Immutable factual record of a human-validated decision in its context.

ethical_attack_surface.global_rule: If a feature cannot be implemented without creating an ethical attack surface that conflicts with this foundation, that feature MUST be suspended or removed.

evolution_and_versions.new_foundation_version_rule: Any change to this file requires a new semantic version and a new cryptographic hash, and must be publicly declared as a different foundation.
evolution_and_versions.non_compliant_systems: Any system that violates this manifest must not be called CHE·NU.
